channel.title: How to say owner is on or off
channel.description: How do i make an npc, say my name is off/on it already says someone elses how do i change it to me?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 08:08:57 AM[/size][hr]any idea?

item.title: How to say owner is on or off
item.dc:creator: @wignall6 wignall6
item.description:
@wignall6 wrote:

Go Into ‘NpcHandler’ And Search ‘Moo’ Then Below Copy This Code.

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YOURNAME")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURNAME is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURNAME is offline!"; } } }

Where It Says ‘NPCID’ Change It To Say The Number For the Npc, And Where It Says ‘YOURNAME’ Change It To Say The Owners Name.

Thanks Wiggy/Wignall6.

Read full topic
item.source: How to say owner is on or off
